content:
ENGLISH 义务教育教科书四年级上册义务教育教科书英 语四年级上册 （一年级起点） （一年级起点） 英语 产品定价：4.90 元全国价格举报电话：12315 
[中国] 河北 教育 出版 社 [加拿大] DC加拿大国际交流中心合作编写四年级上册 ENGLISH 义务教育教科书英语 （一年级起点） 
亲爱的同学们，欢迎你们进入四年级！ 学习英语三年了，你们已经能用英语熟练地互相问候，简单地表达自己的感受，并能介绍一些农场动物，还了解了中西方的饮食文化。 这学期丹尼、詹妮和李明会带领你们学习有关学校、动物园动物、出行、 问路、购物以及如何表达自己的喜好等内容。 你们想用英语描述学校活动吗？ 你们想知道动物园动物的英语名称吗？ 你们想学会用英语问路和购物吗？ 你们知道怎么用英语表达自己的各种喜好吗？那就开始这学期的学习吧！ 只要在学习中积极参与听做、说唱、玩演和读写活动，你们就会体会到英语学习有趣且容易！ 同学们，上学期你们识记了一些简单的词汇。从这学期开始，你们将学习仿写语句。仿写时要注意书写的格式、大小写及标点的正确运用哟！当你们遇到问题时，要主动向老师或同学请教。相信你们一定会学得很棒！ 致同 学 
CONTENTS Unit 1 A New School Year ·············1 Unit 2 We Love Animals ·············17 Unit 3 In the City ·························33 Unit 4 My Favourites ··················49 Word List ·········································65 Vocabulary ······································69 1 UNIT 1 Lessons 1~6 A New School Year

content: 1 UNIT 1 Lessons 1~6 A New School Year 2 1 A new teacher Lesson 1 A New School Year Hello! My name is Jenny. What’s your name ? Nice to meet you, Mr. Wood! Hello class. I’m your teacher. You can call me Mr. Wood. 1 2 3 Hi Mr. Wood! My name is Danny. How are you ? Fine, thanks, Danny. Nice to meet you. 3 B Let’s sing! 2 A new pupil 3 Let’s do it! This is my teacher. He is Mr. Wood. Draw and write. Hello Steven! How are you ? Jenny, this is Steven. He is a new pupil at our school. Fine, thanks. He is tall. He has brown hair. Now, draw and write about your teacher. 4 Lesson 2 Is This Your Pencil? 1 A new friend This is my friend. Her name is Kim. No, Mr. Wood. It’s Jenny’s pencil. Nice to meet you. Hello Kim. My name is Steven. I’m from the U.K. 2 Is this your pencil? Is this your pencil, Steven ? 1

content: 45 I meet an old bird. He says, “Go straight down this street. You’ll see the traffic lights. Turn right at the traffic lights. Then you will see the MICE Apartment on the left.” Finally, I get to the MICE Apartment. My sister is happy to see me. I say, “What a big city! I got lost, but I got much help.” Then I get there. But I see the NICE Apartment, not the MICE Apartment. Excuse me, where is the MICE Apartment ? I’ll show you. Thank you. Me, too. I missed you. 4 5 6 Think About It Does the dog tell the cat the right way? content: 49 UNIT 4 Lessons 19~24 My Favourites 50 Lesson 19 My Favourite Colour 1 Favourite colours What’s your favourite colour ? Green is my favourite, too! I like green and red. My favourite colour is green. I like blue. I like blue, too. We like the same colour. Our favourite colour is blue. They like a different colour. Their favourite colour is green. 1 2 51 This is orange juice. Read and colour. The panda is black and white. These are purple grapes. This is a red pen. It’s a brown monkey. I like shorts, too. Do you like shorts, Danny ? 1 2 3 Their favourite clothes are shorts.

content: 53 2 Let’s chant! I like my green shoe. You like your white glue. We like our purple socks. They like their brown rocks. He likes his orange hat. She likes her pink cat. Our favourite clothes are skirts. Their favourite clothes are shorts. We are different. 4 54 Lesson 21 My Favourite Food 1 Breakfast, lunch and dinner These are meat, chicken and fish. These are vegetables. These are fruits. These are noodles, dumplings, soup and rice. We have breakfast in the morning. We have lunch in the afternoon. We have dinner in the evening. I’m hungry! What’s for lunch ?

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级上册_9b43b3af

content: 55 2 What’s your favourite food? Are you hungry ? Yes, I am. Dumplings and noodles, Yum! Yum! Yum! Are you thirsty ? Yes, I am. Tea and j uice, Please! Please! Please! Look, Danny! It’s twelve o’clock. Lunch time. Great! I’m hungry. What’s your favourite food for lunch, Jenny ? I like hot dogs and j uice for lunch. What’s your favourite food for lunch, Danny ? I like hot dogs and j uice, too. But I don’t like eggs. I don’t like eggs, either. 1 3 2 4 3 Let’s chant! 56 1 2 What sub j ect is it? What’s your favourite sub j ect? Chinese math English P.E. art science music Lesson 22 My Favourite Sub j ect No. I like science. It’s interesting. Kim, what’s your favourite sub j ect ? Do you like English, Danny ? My favourite sub j ect is English. 1 2

content: 57 Lesson 22 My Favourite Sub j ect Jenny √ Math English Chinese Science P.E. Art Subject Name 3 Let’s do it! Steven, what about you ? Do you like P.E., Jenny ? I like P.E. Sure. I also like to draw pictures. Art is my favourite. What’s your favourite sub j ect ? My favourite sub j ect is art. 3 4 Talk and tick.

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级上册_9b43b3af
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级上册_9b43b3af.pdf

content: 58 1 What does she like to do? Lesson 23 My Favourite Thing to Do Zhang Nan is a student in Class 2. There are 43 students in her class. Everyone has his or her favourite thing to do. Some like to draw pictures. Some like to play basketball. Some like to sing songs. But Zhang Nan likes to collect bottles. Every day she collects bottles and puts them in a big box. Then she sells them. With the money, she buys maps and books for her class. She puts the maps on the wall in her classroom. She also buys ﬂ owers and puts them beside the window. Now many other students are doing the same. They have a nice classroom! She likes to collect bottles

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级上册_9b43b3af

content: 59 2 Let’s do it! 2. Talk and write. Letters and sounds 3 Name What does he/she like to do? r ice r iver g r een favou r ite ar ir r sh ir t b ir d sk ir t th ir ty ar t f ar M ar ch f ar m Try to read 1. On a farm, a dog barked to the star in the dark. 2. The blue bird wears a black skirt and a purple shirt. Tongue Twisters a. Zhang Nan is a student in _______. □ Class 2 □ Class 4 b. Zhang Nan likes to _______ every day. □ collect bottles □ buy bottles c. Zhang Nan buys _______ for her class. □ food and drink □ books and maps 1. Read and tick.

content: 60 The Diffos are different. They like purple very much. The Diffos have breakfast in the afternoon. Mr. Diffo wears caps on his fingers. The Diffos love fish with ice cream. Lesson 24 The Diffos That’s not purple. That’s green. The dog has my purple sock. I like to wear caps on my head. That’s different! Diffo Dog, where’s my hamburger ? This is our favourite dinner. We like fi sh with ice cream. Would you like some ? 1 3 2 4 Story time

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级上册_9b43b3af

content: 61 What do they like to do? David Diffo likes to play with his dog. At school, David and Debbie Diffo like to sing songs in the library. Debbie Diffo likes to fly kites. But she likes to fly them in the house. People always get angry at the Diffos. Read books in the library ? That’s different. SHHHHH! SHHHHH! This is our favourite song! Purple, purple! Yahoo! We like to sing, but they like to read. 5 7 6 8 Think About It Their favourite colour is pink. Their favourite dinner is cake with ice cream. David and Debbie like to sing songs in the library. Diffo 迪福 cap 帽子 hamburger 汉堡 David 大卫 Debbie 黛比 True or false . Good boy, Diffo Dog!

content: 62 Unit 4 Review 1 2 Listen and circle Look and write ________ likes ________ red dress. (she, her) ________ like to eat donuts. Donuts are ________ favourite food. (their, they) ________ likes to play ping-pong. That’s ________ favourite sport. (his, he) ________ like ________ book. (you, your) ________ like blue. Blue is ________ favourite colour. (our, we) ________ like to play with ________ toy. (I, my) 1 3 2 4 63 4 3 Talk and write Read and write Spin and talk. Their Favourites Bob, Jim and Lynn are good friends. Bob’s favourite colour is red. Jim likes green. Lynn likes yellow. What are their favourite clothes? Lynn likes skirts, but Bob and Jim like shorts. Jim loves donuts. Lynn likes dumplings, and Bob likes noodles. Math and art are their favourite subjects. Bob Jim Lynn red green shorts noodles dumplings math and art Kim: My favourite subject is English. What about you? Jenny: My... My favourite sub j ect is...

content: 64 Words: favourite blue green red shorts skirt fruit soup rice juice box subject art music our their too about also with Sentences: What’s your favourite colour? I like blue. What’s your favourite food for lunch? I like hot dogs and juice for lunch. What’s your favourite subject? My favourite subject is English. Key words and sentences 5 Speaking Reading Writing Listening At school At home Total stars I am... A 10 ~ 12 B 7 ~ 9 C 1 ~ 6 1 6 How am I doing?
